title: Trainee Tea Buyer
snippet: A rare opportunity to launch your career at the heart of the tea industry. Learn the art and science of tea tasting and gain in-depth knowledge of the global tea supply chain. Salary: £30k.

description.intro: Join one of the world's leading beverage companies. As a Trainee Tea Buyer, you'll become an integral part of the Tea Buying & Blending team. You'll learn the art and science of tea tasting, gain in-depth knowledge of the global tea supply chain, 'from bush to cup'. After five years of dedicated training, you'll be ready to manage your own origin as a qualified Tea Buyer.
responsibilities: Taste up to 300 teas, fruit and herbal blends per day to develop expert sensory skills.
Support Buyers/Assistant Buyers in all aspects of the procurement process.
Analyse market trends and contribute to contract negotiations.
Collect and interpret data on global tea availability for strategic buying.
Manage and analyse large datasets using Excel and SAP.
qualifications: A 2:2 in your chosen degree subject (non-grads are also encouraged to apply).
Strong analytical skills and comfort dealing with large data sets (Excel daily).
Strong planning, time management and organisation skills.
Cultural and commercial awareness; works well under pressure.

title: Sales Representatives (Commission Only)
snippet: We are looking for regional sales representatives... to promote and sell our unique Flora Tea (Flowering Teas). Commission only, easy start, great products...

description.intro: Flora Tea Company UK Limited is looking for regional sales representatives across the UK and Ireland to promote and sell their unique Flowering Teas. This is a commission-only role targeting restaurants, hotels, tea houses, and independent stores.
responsibilities: Promote and sell Flora Tea products in the designated region.
Develop retail distribution through specialist outlets and gift shops.
Demonstrate products and secure initial orders.
qualifications: Willingness and passion to learn about the product range and brand.
Previous strong selling background desired but not essential.
